docs: Yield rate in basis points (e.g., 500 = 5%)

docs: Maximum NFTs per user in this pool

docs: Maximum tokens per user in this pool

docs: Maximum total value in this pool (tokens + nfts * nft_value)

fields.name: is_paused
docs: Whether the pool is paused
